channel.title: sensorial on Miss Amanda
channel.description: Recent content in sensorial on Miss Amanda

item.title: Tower of Cubes
item.description: Tower of Cubes Materials: Ten solid wooden cubes the largest of which is 10 cm3 the smallest of which is 1 cm3. Each cube decreases in size by 1 cm3. Presentation: Invite the child to work with the tower of cubes. Obtain and unroll a rug in the accepted manner. Walk to the area of the room containing the tower of cubes.

item.title: Making a Turkey
item.description: hi Just make the turkey. It’s pretty easy.
